long_description: The all-purpose MTI Reflex PFD features a clean design, a comfortable fit, and excellent floatation at a great value. The Reflex PFD offers reliable comfort for canoeing, kayaking, paddleboarding rafting and other recreational watersports. Adjustable shoulder straps offer a versatile fit; either tighten up the shoulder area for a snug fit or loosen for more chest room. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. 2 open mesh zippered cargo pockets securely store essentials and drain water quickly. Dual strap adjustments create a snug fit on each side; adjustable waist strap has a quick-release buckle. The MTI Reflex PFD features a durable, 300-denier polyester shell for long-lasting service.
short_description: The all-purpose MTI Reflex PFD features a clean design, a comfortable fit, and excellent floatation at a great value.
